aboutMe.text: I am a Front-end developer based in North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. I enjoy helping designers and companies bring their ideas into real life. I am looking forward to continuing my developer career with a job in a junior web developer position.
aboutMe.secParagraph: If you think I’d be a good match for your projects, contact me!
aboutMe.location: Seat in the district of Recklinghausen.

mySkills.commentpart1: Don’t see the skill you need?

portfolio.headtext: Feel free to try out my latest development projects and look into their code.
portfolio.jointext: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
portfolio.elpollotext: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help sharkie to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer whale.

references.headtext: I thrive both independently and as part of a team. Here’s what my colleagues have to say about working with me.
references.refOne: Michael really kept the team together with his great organization and clear communication. We wouldn`t have got this far without his commitment.
references.refTow: Michi was a top team colleague at DA. His positive commitment and willingness to take on responsibility made a significant contribution to us achieving our goals.
references.refThree: It was a great pleasure to work with Michael. He knows how to push and encourage team members to present the best work possible, always adding something to brainstorm. Regarding the well-being of group members, he was always present and available to listen and help others, with a great sense of humor as well.

contactMe.headtext: Want to discuss a new project?
contactMe.comment: Say hello! let's discuss your ideas and make it happen
contactMe.name: Your name

contactMe.emialSendFaild: Php and angular have successfully shit the bed. May you send the email to me directly at me@maximilianstark.dev using a mail provider of or choosing gmail outlook or others.
contactMe.emialSendSuccessful: The email was sent successfully to my inbox please give me some to react (1-2 days not business days).
